quickLabel.description: Button to start a game of marathon

quickDescription.message: Inizia subito una partita in Maratona con le impostazioni predefinite

gameStylesOverline.description: Header for the various types of games (Guideline, Retro, etc)

guidelineDescription.message: Standard variant of the puzzle found in most modern games

tetraxDescription.message: A custom variant of the puzzle originally designed for this game

retroDescription.message: Classic variant of the puzzle loved by oldschool players

arcadeDescription.message: Difficult variant of the puzzle loved by hardcore players

discordDescription.message: Entra su Discord per discutere del gioco, ricevere nuovi aggiornamenti, contribuire con nuove idee e migliorare le traduzioni
